admission_process.overview: Padma Kanya College offers undergraduate programs in BSC CSIT and BIT. Admission is based on merit and entrance exams.
requirements: Completed +2 or equivalent with minimum GPA
admission_process.deadlines: Applications open in June, close in August each year.
admission_process.fees: Contact admissions for detailed fee structure.

contact_info.address: Padma Kanya College, Bagbazar, Kathmandu, Nepal

college_overview.history: Established in 1951, Padma Kanya College is a premier institution for women's education in Nepal.
programs: BSC CSIT (Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology)

public_notices: College open from 9 AM to 5 PM.
